### Montana Defensive Driving Course Online | MT Traffic Ticket Prevention

TrafficSchool.com, together with Defensive Driving leader IDriveSafely.com,
brings Montana drivers a defensive driving course designed to keep your Motor
Vehicle Division driving record clean by teaching accident prevention and
defensive driving skills. In addition, your local Montana Court or MT MVD may
allow you, with advanced permission, dismiss a traffic ticket from your
driving record by completing this state of Montana defensive driving course.
Contact your MT traffic court or Montana Motor Vehicle Division to see if you
are eligible for traffic school.

The intended use of this course is for educational purposes only. If you are
taking this course for an insurance discount, Montana traffic ticket
dismissal, point reduction or some other purpose, you must seek prior approval
from your local insurance company, Montana traffic court or governing state
agency (i.e. Motor Vehicle Division).

#### Why a Driver Improvement Course in Montana: Become a defensive driver and
possibly earn an insurance discount.*

There are many reasons why drivers in The Treasure State should take an online
defensive driving course. First and foremost, an online driver improvement
course educates Montanan drivers on how to drive both defensively and with
courtesy. Knowing how to handle your vehicle on all types of MT streets and
highways, in all types of traffic conditions is imperative.

Besides the knowledge gained, MT drivers completing our online course may
receive a discount on the base rate of your auto insurance premium. Because
this internet course is not approved by the Motor Vehicle Division, you must
contact your individual insurance agent to find out what kind of discount, if
any, they will provide for completing our course.

#### The Advantages of Taking an Online MT Defensive Driver Improvement Course

  * Our Montana Defensive Driving Course is up to date with the latest defensive driving techniques.
  * Contact your insurance agent! You'd be surprised what kind of discount you can get on your auto insurance if you simply ask. In today's competitive insurance market, Montana car insurance agents don't want to lose your business. Many MT insurance agents will grant you a discount of 10%-20% when you complete a defensive driving course.
  * Have questions about how an online traffic safety course in The Treasure State can help you? Our friendly and helpful customer service staff is waiting for your call, toll-free at 800-691-5014.

#### How our MT Driver Improvement Course Works

  1. Register quick and easy online from any computer or mobile device in Montana. All you need is internet connection.
  2. Study the course around your schedule, at your pace. Read it in a day or spread the lessons out over several days - it's up to you.
  3. Along the way, interactive lessons and section quizzes to help you retain the defensive driving information you just studied.
  4. Ready to see how much you've learned? Take the final exam and see if you have truly become an improved driver in Montana!

#### Please Note

**MONTANAN DRIVERS WHO HAVE RECEIVED A TRAFFIC CITATION IN THE STATE OF
MONTANA  
  
Although this Montana Traffic Safety course is an ELECTIVE COURSE and is not
required by the state of Montana, nor is this course approved by the Montana
Motor Vehicle Division (MT MVD), we HIGHLY RECOMMEND that you contact the
Montana Traffic Court that issued your ticket and request traffic school. For
minor traffic citations for moving violations, many Montanan Judges will grant
you permission to attend traffic school to fix your traffic ticket.

This online Montana Driver Improvement course is recommended as an educational
tool to help you become a more knowledgeable and defensive driver in the state
of Montana.
